Test for orphans and widows

On success, you will see a series of "PASS" messages, followed by "TEST COMPLETE".


FAIL: expected page number of "page1-1" is 1. Was 0
PASS: page number of "page1-2" is 1
PASS: page number of "page1-3" is 1
FAIL: expected page number of "page2" is 2. Was 1
FAIL: expected page number of "page3" is 3. Was 2
FAIL: expected page number of "page4" is 4. Was 3
FAIL: expected page number of "page5" is 5. Was 3
FAIL: expected page number of "page6-1" is 6. Was 5
FAIL: expected page number of "page6-2" is 6. Was 5
FAIL: expected page number of "page7" is 7. Was 6
FAIL: expected page number of "page8" is 8. Was 7
FAIL: expected page number of "page9" is 9. Was 7

PASS successfullyParsed is true

TEST COMPLETE
